name: Klubnacht (Berghain)
description: Berghain's legendary Klubnacht continues its tradition as one of the world's most important techno institutions. This edition features Answer Code Request, Clarisa Kimskii, Dax J, Len Faki, Nastia Reigel, Rene Wise, and Tasha in the main room, with the Panorama Bar hosting Lord Of The Isles Live, Gerd Janson, Herv√©, John Spring, Lea Occhi, Nathalie Seres, nd_baumecker, and Victor. The venue remains a pilgrimage site for electronic music devotees worldwide, offering an uncompromising experience that bridges underground credibility with cultural significance.
